name: The Lightning Wizard's Adventure
description:
This is the game I made for a little game jam made by me and some friends. We only allowed 1 day of work with the theme being 'speed' and this is my result.

Story: You are following one of the greatest wizards that have ever lived in his journey across the world. You have to help him avoid obstacles along the way by telling him where to teleport. If you don't help him, because of the his lightning magic which gives tremendous speed, he will crash into an obstacle and lose his precious life, which is something we don't want. :)

Controls: 

A - teleport to your left

D - teleport to your right

W - teleport up if you are not already in the air

S - teleport back down if you are in the air

Escape - pause menu

Music: 

Menu - Tavern Medieval Ballad - Legend

Level - Guile's Theme
